TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PagerSettings extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class PagerSettings Implements IStateManager
public ref class PagerSettings sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示支持分页的控件中的分页控件的属性。

span.span: Represents the properties of the paging controls in a control that supports pagination.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件 (如， ，和控件) 可以显示一组控件调用*寻呼程序*，它允许用户在控件内的页面之间导航。Controls that support pagination (such as the , , and controls) can display a set of controls called *the pager* that allows the user to navigate the pages within the control. 这些控件使用类来表示寻呼程序的属性。The class is used by these controls to represent the properties of the pager. 一般情况下，对象存储在`PagerSettings`的控件属性。In general, the object is stored in the `PagerSettings` property of the control. 您可以通过设置的属性来自定义寻呼程序对象。You can customize the pager by setting the properties of the object. 寻呼程序支持多种不同的显示模式。The pager supports several different display modes. 若要指定要在其中显示寻呼程序模式，请设置属性。To specify the mode in which to display the pager, set the property. 下表描述了不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一步页和下一步按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一步的页上下, 一步页、 第一页和最后一页按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last -page buttons.| ||直接带编号的访问页面的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||带编号的链接、 第一个链接和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered-link, first-link, and last-link buttons.| 当属性设置为， ，或可以通过设置以下表所示的属性来自定义非数字按钮的文本的值。When the property is set to the , , or value you can customize the text of the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||上一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一步按钮的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||最后一页按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 作为替代方法，还可以通过设置以下表中所示的属性中显示的非数字按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 设置映像属性，则对应的文本属性将作为图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，当设置属性，通过指定的文本属性显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 当属性设置为或值，你可以指定要通过设置在寻呼程序中显示的页按钮数属性。When the property is set to the or value, you can specify the number of page buttons to display in the pager by setting the property. 寻呼程序可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件。The pager can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of a control. 若要指定寻呼程序的位置，设置属性。To specify the position of the pager, set the property. 若要显示或隐藏寻呼程序，使用属性。To show or hide the pager, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中包含的对象属性可自定义的页导航行中显示的按钮的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object that is contained in the property to customize the text of the buttons that are displayed in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建的新实例类。Use the constructor to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 使用构造函数通常是由控件开发人员提供自定义控件中的分页支持时。The constructor generally is used by control developers when providing paging support in a custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性指定为第一页按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，可以通过设置显示的第一页按钮文本属性而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display text for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果和都设置属性，图像将显示与属性充当图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性才会显示的页导航行中的第一页按钮图像控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的文字。

span.span: The text to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值是"<<"，这将呈现为"<<"。

span.span: The default is "<<", which renders as "<<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要显示的第一页按钮的文本。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，你可以通过设置显示第一页按钮图像属性而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果和都设置属性，图像将显示与属性充当图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可自定义中的页导航行的第一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the first-page button of the pager row in a control. summary.span: 获取或设置支持分页的控件中的页导航控件的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode in which to display the pager controls in a control that supports pagination.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件提供了多个要在其中显示的分页控件模式。Controls that support pagination provide multiple modes in which to display the paging controls. 使用属性以指定的模式。Use the property to specify the mode. 下表介绍分页控件不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes for pagination controls. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一步页和下一步按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一步页、 下一页、 第一页和最后一页的按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last-page buttons.| ||直接带编号的访问页面的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||编号和第一个链接和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered and first-link and last-link buttons.| 当属性设置为， ，或值，你可以通过设置以下表所示的属性指定为非数字按钮的自定义文本。When the property is set to the , , or value, you can specify custom text for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||上一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一步按钮的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||最后一页按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 作为替代方法，还可以通过设置以下表所示的属性中显示的非数字按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 设置映像属性，则对应的文本属性将作为图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，当设置属性，通过指定的文本属性显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定页导航行控件应显示数值的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager row for a control should display numeric buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/CS/PagerSettingsNumericcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/VB/PagerSettingsNumericvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示寻呼程序从其位置。Use the property to specify the location at which to display the pager. 下表描述了不同的位置。The following table describes the different positions. |PositionPosition|位置Location| |--------------|--------------| ||底部的控件。The bottom of the control.| ||该控件的顶部。The top of the control.| ||在顶部和底部的控件上。At both the top and bottom of the control.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以在底部显示的页导航行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the pager row at the bottom of a control. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要为上一页按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，可以显示为上一页按钮的文本，通过设置属性而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display text for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果和都设置属性，图像将显示与属性充当图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性才会显示的页导航行中的前一页按钮图像控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the previous-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 为前一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 默认值是"<"，这将呈现为"<"。

span.span: The default is "<", which renders as "<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要显示为上一页按钮的文本。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，你可以通过设置中显示上一页按钮图像属性而不是属性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果和都设置属性，图像将显示与属性充当图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可自定义中的页导航行的前一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager row in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当 对象的属性更改值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a property of a object changes values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的一种属性的每次都会引发对象更改值。The event is raised each time a property of a object changes values. 事件常用的数据绑定控件所支持分页的页导航设置更改时重新绑定到控件的数据。The event commonly is used by data-bound controls that support pagination to rebind the data to the control when the pager settings change. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

value.span: 如果数据源视图被标记为保存其状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 可以使用它时，才实例被强制转换为接口。It can be used only when the instance is cast to the interface.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以加载以前保存的视图状态的对象。Use the method to load the previously saved view state of the object. > [!NOTE] > 方法是私有的无法调用。The method is private and cannot be called.

returns.span: 一个包含 的已保存状态的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the saved state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用一个帮助器方法类以保存对象的状态。The method is a helper method that is used by the class to save the state of the object. > [!NOTE] > 方法是私有的无法调用。The method is private and cannot be called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 标记开始跟踪并将视图状态更改保存到 对象的起始点。

span.span: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view state changes to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法被重写以标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点作为对象的视图状态的一部分的对象。The method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the object as part of the view state for the object. > [!NOTE] > 方法是私有的无法调用。The method is private and cannot be called.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在支持分页的控件中显示分页控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging controls are displayed in a control that supports pagination.

value.span: 若要显示页导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the pager; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否支持分页的控件中显示的分页控件。Use the property to specify whether the paging controls are displayed in a control that supports pagination. 若要隐藏的分页控件，设置属性`false`。To hide the paging controls, set the property to `false`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来隐藏页导航行时控件处于编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the pager row when a control is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsVisible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsVisible/CS/PagerSettingsVisiblecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsVisible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsVisible/VB/PagerSettingsVisiblevb.aspx#1)]
